outline:
1. to start up, tremble, shake, spring up
    1. (Qal) to start up
    2. (Piel) to leap
    3. (Hiphil) to cause to start up
  2. to loose, let loose, undo, be free, be loose
    1. (Hiphil)
      1. to unfasten, loosen
      2. to set free, unbind
kjv_def: drive asunder, leap, (let) loose, [idiom] make, move, undo.
strongs_def: to jump, i.e. be violently agitated; causatively, to terrify, shake off, untie
